body.p:
Office of the Chief of Police,
Louisville, Ky., Dec 31st 1860
John W Pruett Esq
Dr Sir

Will you be so kind as to present the within Indictment against Isaac Rosenbaum, to his Excellency and rquest of him, a Requisition on the Governor of Indiana for said Rosenbaum appointing Robert A. Leay agent, to convey him to our State by attending to this you will much oblige

Your Friend & Obt Svt
J. B. Ehrich
